name: Police Bus Racing
description:
Get ready for the off-road experience of your life with Police Bus Racing! It will test your nerves and take you to the extremes offroad driving capabilities.

You must use all of your Racing and dodging skills to reach the end of the Race . You’ll need quick reactions and nifty fingers, as there are many opposition players trying to take you down.Think you can dodge your way to the End Zone? Good,Fasten your seat belt, and let’s get running!
publishers: Al Khawarizmi Software Development and Services
